entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pontiac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
